summary: 2011 MAZDA CX-7.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO UNSATISFACTORY CUSTOMER SERVICE AT DEALERSHIP WITH REPAIRS AND RENTAL VEHICLE SERVICE.  *LD    THE CONSUMER STATED THE ONLY VEHICLE THE DEALERSHIP OFFERED WAS A TRUCK. THE CONSUMER IS HANDICAPPED AND IT WAS DIFFICULT TO ENTER AND EXIT THE VEHICLE. UPDATED 07/13/2017*JS
